data.name: Hidden_Sort_Grid_Desc
data.value: PCF subgrid with readonly/editable modes, optional filters and sorting, and support for hidden and locked columns.

data.name: Hide_Sorting_Column_Desc
data.value: Hides the technical sort column / header in the grid UI. Default: enabled.

data.name: Editable_Grid_Desc
data.value: Enable inline editing in the grid. Default: disabled.

data.name: Enable_Filtering_Desc
data.value: Allow quick filtering in the grid. Default: enabled.

data.name: Enable_Sorting_Desc
data.value: Allow sorting by column. Default: enabled.

data.name: Allow_Row_Selection_Desc
data.value: Allow selecting rows in the grid (checkbox / highlight). Default: enabled.

data.name: Locked_Columns_Desc
data.value: Comma-separated logical names of columns locked in editable mode (non-editable). Default: empty.

data.name: Show_Open_Record_Column_Desc
data.value: Add an action column to open the record in a new tab. Default: disabled.
